name: Penguins - Local Warming
description:
Penguins - Local Warming is a puzzle game similar to the old classic Lemmings. It was created for  the 8-bits to Infinity game jam, VimJam 3.

You must try to save the penguins using only ice, the ability to heat things up and your cunning! Can you save them all?

This game is played with a mouse and works best when run fullscreen.
